title: Native Foods - Boulder
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion
description: Part of the Native Foods vegan restaurant brand from Southern California. Original menu of salads, veggie burgers, rice and noodle bowls, vegan desserts, chai with soymilk, organic coffee, and more. In-house tempeh and seitan (wheat meat). Order at the counter, and food is brought to your table. Confirmed open, July 2014.
